SOUTH ATLANTIC.
DNC 01.
DISTRESS SIGNAL RECEIVED IN 24-01S 009-40W. VESSELS
IN VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP LOOKOUT,
ASSIST IF POSSIBLE. REPORTS TO MRCC CAPE TOWN,
